name: Wooden Donkey
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.Beast of Burden: The donkey is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.
traits.Sure-Footed: The donkey has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
